DOC.brief_title: Vortioxetine ( Lu AA21004 ) 10 20 mg Treatment Major Depressive Disorder With Sexual Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: The drug test study call Lu AA21004 . Lu AA21004 test treat people major depressive disorder ( MDD ) . This study look sexual function people take Lu AA21004 . The study enroll approximately 440 patient . Participants randomly assign ( chance , like flip coin ) one two treatment groups—which remain undisclosed patient study doctor study ( unless urgent medical need ) : - Lu AA21004 10 20 mg - Escitalopram 10 20 mg - This comparator drug also use treat MDD . All participant ask take one tablet time day throughout study . All participant ask answer questionnaire study visit . This multi-centre trial conduct United States Canada . The overall time participate study 14 week . Participants make 7 visit clinic , contact telephone 21 day last dose study drug follow-up assessment .
